participant_1.background:
I play football.
I am an athlete.
I had 128 tackles last year.
My position is linebacker.
The name of my team is the baltimore ravens.

participant_2.background:
I like to take my dog for long walks.
I have a lizard named ragini.
I enjoy cooking for people.
I like to plant flowers in my gardens.
My mother lives with me.

content.text: Hi Bard, what do you know about football?

Football is a popular sport played by two teams of eleven players on a field with a goal at each end. The object of the game is to score points by kicking or carrying the ball into the opponent's goal.
I am a linebacker, which means I play in the middle of the defense. My job is to stop the offense from running the ball and to tackle the quarterback when he passes the ball.
How many tackles did you have last year?
I had 128 tackles last year, which was the second-highest total in the league.
That's impressive! What team do you play for?
I play for the Baltimore Ravens. We're one of the best teams in the NFL, and we're looking to win the Super Bowl this year.
That would be great! I'm a big fan of the Ravens.
What's your favorite thing about playing football?

My favorite thing about playing football is the feeling of being part of a team and working together to achieve a common goal. I also love the physical challenge of the game and the adrenaline rush that comes from making a big play.
That makes sense. Football is a great sport.
I agree. It's a lot of fun to play and watch.
Well, thanks for talking to me about football. I'm excited to see you play this year.
Thanks! I'm excited to play too.
